channel.title: How do i make a altar work so when u pray prayer recharges?
channel.description:
enyway i need a altar that works but i dont no how to make it work altar code is
409 so can someone give me a code or help me out on how to make it work?

item.title: How do i make a altar work so when u pray prayer recharges?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

case 409: setSkillLevel(5, getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]), playerXP[5]); playerLevel[5] = getLevelForXP(playerXP[5]); refreshSkills(); setAnimation(645); sendMessage("You recharge your prayer"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break;

Read full topic
